Hempstead.Saint Mary's Chapel (Carle Place, New Yo: Saint Mary's Chapel, also known as Saint Mary's Episcopal Church, is a historic Episcopal church located on Rushmore Avenue between Roslyn Avenue and Glen Cove Avenue in Carle Place, Nassau County, New York. It was built in 1926, and is a one-story, rectangular, Tudor Revival style church building. It has a steeply pitched gable roof and low eaves.
